author: Rick Katribe
comment: Easy to read. Plus, I like having battery indicators for both the phone and the watch. Would like to see the hour hand in a different color for quicker recognition.  Edit: upgraded my review to five stars because the watchface modification to allow the user to change the colors of the watch hands.

reply.author: Ampullarius
reply.content: Now you can select hand colors in configuration page.

title: Nice 24 hr face!

author: Scott GrantSmith
comment: Crashes with message "Unfortunately, Spiral of Time has stopped."
Installed app & it did not appear
